tool.name: Samtools reheader

param.name: input_header
param.label: Select source dataset
param.help: Header from this dataset will be used to replace header in the target dataset. May be either SAM or BAM dataset.

param.name: input_file
param.label: Select target dataset
param.help: Header from the source dataset will be inserted here. Should be a BAM dataset.

param.name: no_pg
param.label: Keep the new header unmodified?
param.help: By default, samtools reheader will add itself to the chain of tools used to manipulate the target dataset, which will cause one or more @PG records to be inserted into the new header. If you want the output dataset to end up with the header of the source dataset exactly, you should activate this option.

tool.help:
**What it does**
Generates a new BAM dataset with the contents of *target* dataset, but the header of *source* dataset using the ``samtools reheader`` command.
